headline: After 74 Years, Family to Claim Remains  Of Japanese Man Interred at U.S. Camp
abstract: In 1945, Giichi Matsumura left the infamous Japanese-American internment camp to paint in the Sierra Nevada and never returned.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 75 years ago, Giichi Matsumura left the grounds of the Manzanar War Relocation Center in California with a group of fishermen who had set out for the lakes of the Sierra Nevada.
